original_title: La Folie du Décret du Frère
overview: A friar, aided by his water-boy son, Watr Boy, attempts to read an oblique decree as increasingly bizarre characters interrupt him. A Neo-Neo-Dadaist work interrogating time, reality, death, and meaning(lessness).
tagline: It had nothing to say, and it said it...brilliantly.
title: La Folie du Décret du Frère
